SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
CaesarCipher
The CaesarCipher class implements encryption and decryption using the Caesar cipher technique.
CharacterCipher
Abstract class for ciphers that work on character data.
CipherEnum
An enumeration representing the available cipher types for encryption.
Clack
Main program.
Client
Represents a client that connects to a server for sending and receiving messages.
ClientUI
The main UI class for the Clack client application.
FileMessage
Represents a message containing a file's content for upload.
HelpMessage
This class represents a message requesting usage information.
ListUsersMessage
This class represents a command to the server, asking for a list of all active users of the server.
LoginMessage
Represents a message containing login credentials, including the username and password.
LogoutMessage
This class represents a command to the server, asking for termination of the connection.
Message
Abstract base class for Clack messages.
MsgType
An enumeration representing message types.
OptionEnum
An enumeration representing different types of OptionMessage.
OptionMessage
This class represents a message that contains an option and its corresponding value.
PlayfairCipher
The PlayfairCipher class implements encryption and decryption using the Playfair cipher technique.
Server
Represents a server that handles client connections for sending and receiving messages.
TextMessage
This class represents messages containing text entered from the keyboard.
VignereCipher
The VignereCipher class implements encryption and decryption using the Vigenère cipher technique.
